sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Heading, Flex } from "rebass"; import { Hero, Feature } from "react-landing-page"; import { Box, Typography, Button } from '@material-ui/core'; import Sunflower from './Sunflower'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Home(props: any) { return ( {/* */} INTRODUCING OUR PROJECT An educational platform that provide educators and students with tools for better learning. {/* */} OUR GOALS Provide young students in under-developed countries with a better education platform to help them and their countries speed up their development. WHY ? Usable Visual Alert Simple Responsive ) }
